articles.description: CHRISTIAN ERIKSEN reminded Manchester United fans of his quality against Croatia on Thursday.

articles.title: John McGinn on Scotland caps ambition: 'Why not aim for 100?' - BBC
articles.description: John McGinn is ready for a "pinch me moment" as Scotland captain on his 50th cap, but is aiming for many more international appearances.
articles.content:
McGinn captained Scotland to a 3-0 win over Ukraine, scoring his 14th international goal

articles.title: Man City could finally sign player Pep Guardiola has already praised for nothing in the summer - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester City could snag some great players for free in the next summer transfer window.
articles.content:
Manchester City haven't had the need to shop in the bargain bucket in recent years but they recently proved they're not averse to a good deal when they can find one.
